snippet: Judge Lourdes Afiuni, imprisoned for more than three and a half years, had become a symbol of political persecution.
abstract: Venezuelan court orders release of Judge Lourdes Afiuni, who was jailed in 2009 after issuing a court ruling that infuriated late Pres Hugo Chavez.

byline.original: By WILLIAM NEUMAN and MARÍA EUGENIA DÍAZ
byline.contributor: William Neuman reported from New York, and María Eugenia Díaz from Caracas, Venezuela.

lead_paragraph: Judge Lourdes Afiuni, imprisoned for more than three and a half years, had become a symbol of political persecution.

headline.main: Court in Venezuela Orders Release of a Judge Once Scorned and Jailed by Chávez
headline.print_headline: Court in Venezuela Orders Release of a Judge Once Scorned and Jailed by Chávez
